name: StockBuddy
0:
”Alexa, open stock buddy”
”stocks for Amazon”
”give me the stock information on Google”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stock buddy
des:
This skill will allow you to find out the latest stock value of a company you specify. You can specify a company and the skill will retrieve the latest data available. If it is the weekend, you will get the last traded date, which is the previous Friday.

Currently, you can only look up the stock info for one company. However, there are plans for multiple companies at once and storing those companies in your own portfolio within the Skill.
